website_summaries.verdict: A standout watch in the Diesel line, but it may not stand up to daily wear.
pros: Super-chunky, stylish watch that stands out when worn on the wrist
Big and tall men will find it a great fit as well
Despite its size, not too hefty
cons: even a glancing pass through a running tap may fog the glass
Standard-sized band, meaning users may need to order a replacement size smaller or bigger

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch and it fits my big wrist
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch and it fits my big wrist. But the strap is too big, making it loose. How do I adjust it? I'd be happier if the strap is reduced. That's why I'm giving it a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Fredo

customer_reviews.title: Really bad experience with this item
customer_reviews.text: Really bad experience with this item, the watch intruction say water resistant but it's not true look the pictures can you send me another one
customer_reviews.author: Delmy sosa

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Must have super small wrist
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch! Unfortunately the band was either missing links that should have been there or is made for a man with a child size wrist/hand. My husband couldn’t get it on easily and once he did get it on he could not clasp it without losing circulation to his hand. Very disappointing at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Q Bella

customer_reviews.title: Faulty watchband
customer_reviews.text: Husband was pleased with how it looks and has worn it casually over the last two months he has owned it, but just the other day he felt it suddenly fall off into his sleeve, and found that the pin in the link that connects to the clasp was missing. After years of numerous $50 Fossil watches and this has never happened, 2 months and this one falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Coupon Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Love... <3
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I wear it whenever I can....even at the gym o_0. It's a looker. I have an older black strap version, I wanted something a little less bold looking in color so I went with this brown strapped Daddy size watch. But be warned the colors are slightly off from the picture. The real item has more of a dark chocolate brown strap (this picture is reddish brown) And the bluish-grey face isn't so bright like in the picture--darker, but still bluish grey. Still an awesome watch though...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got water inside after one shower
customer_reviews.text: I got the watch and on the 1st day it got water inside after one single shower.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Played football @Fresno State and it's perfect for a BULLDOG or a BULLDOG fan!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is definitely not for everyone, it's large red and will draw attention. You must read the instructions to operate properly. It tells time I believe in 4 timezones so it will take me some time to learn. I bought it once as nd returned it for something more conservative but once I received the new watch in grey I could barely read it and it just didn't have the IT factor. Beautiful built like a tank and the rubber finished band makes it very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Grayson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: One Handsome Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance just cause and he loves it. We were in the mall and he spotted it in a store and was gawking over it. Ordered it on Amazon and got a much better deal. He's muscular and has big wrist. The watch fits great and he didn't need links removed.
customer_reviews.author: K R

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch but seal or gasket it's bad.
customer_reviews.text: It is actually a very beautiful watch and keeps time very well. I am beyond the warrantee time but today when I stuck my hand and water moisture appear inside the watch. Very disappointing for what I pay for it and what I'm used to. I will reach out to the company to see if there's anything they can do. I reached out to the seller and they were AWESOME in getting it resolved. The watch couldn't be repaired so they gave me a full refund. SDK is definitely a great company and stand behind their sales.
customer_reviews.author: SW1

customer_reviews.title: Yes it is...BIG!!
customer_reviews.text: ...but it is a magnet to the eyes. The red is vibrant and looks so great with the black dial. Most of all it shows you like to be original and different. I never wore anything on my wrist that generated so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.text: I live temporary in Colombia , i bought the watch a few days before travel , It was a gift ,the watch is beautiful ,but I feel desapointed because the crown has fallen and lost the first day of use, and sadly I can’t do nothing right here
customer_reviews.author: Lady Paola Galvis

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not authentic!!! Chinese knock off!!! I usually don't but watches off Amazon because of this reason. Since this was my first Diesel, I figured why not. When I received it, the box was broken. No manual. And the band had black stains from rubbing against the black box. While searching the net, I was disappointed to see that Diesels are a common knock off. I should have returned it when I had the chance. $200 for a knock off? Don't give your money away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, impractical & flawed design.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is really beautiful and it is really nice that you can set four different time zones on it. However, it is poorly designed. The prongs used to adjust the time are quite large, and will pierce into the back of your hand whenever you’re wearing the watch. Since the watch is so large, there aren’t many ways you can work around this as far as watch placement goes. Now it makes sense to me why the company discontinued such a nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Ryo Higuchi

customer_reviews.title: Developed moisture droplets inside within first week
customer_reviews.text: It's a big beautiful watch I love it. This is my second one but my first from this seller. Unfortunately with this one I developed water droplets inside the watch after only a couple of days. This means that the face has been removed and replaced and it's not air tight. I will never be able to get rid of the moisture and it will eventually destroy the watch. For this reason I can't recommend it for anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Goulet

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality!!! it's not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: item suppose to be waterproof and it was not. just was at pool, put in pool for a moment and put out immediately... that's the result. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: koba chalisuri

customer_reviews.title: my friends really like it. Personally feel too big
customer_reviews.text: Help friends to buy, my friends really like it. Personally feel too big, but personality.
customer_reviews.author: shy

customer_reviews.title: It punches you in the eye, with shiny elegance
customer_reviews.text: DIESEL Mr. Daddy 2.0 : the most badass watch on the globe. It feels like a spaceship landed on my wrist. Massively Imposing, refined, atypical by choice. It punches you in the eye, with shiny elegance. Not your ordinary watch, for sure, and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Talotta

customer_reviews.title: Diesel watches have a water resistance problem. Within a ...
customer_reviews.text: Diesel watches have a water resistance problem. Within a few day water seeps into it and that's only from washing my hands. This is my third diesel watch with the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: heromario1

customer_reviews.title: Faker than a Chinese man with a moustache
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely fake , very cheap and disturbingly fake. I have about 6 Diesel watches and this looks nothing like the ones i have.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd watch i bought from Diesel. I love the Color and the design. Other people often comment on how they like my watch
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius

customer_reviews.title: Invisiblity
customer_reviews.text: Almost Invisible, The hands are color match to face so if there's no light you cant see the time. there no glow what so ever waist of money. didn't realize looking at it, before I brought this. please choose another style
customer_reviews.author: Blackstorm_X130

customer_reviews.title: This is a hell of a watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch, I been wanting it for a while and when I saw it on Amazon I had to have it. It's a game changer and everyone who saw it was asking me questions about the watch. A lot of which I could not answer because honestly it keeps time on like four places. But the watch was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Fugett

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, I thought I would get lots of attention from the ladies but it's always the guys that comment on it. Hmmmmm. Well, anyway, it's very stylish and has 3 time zones, not that I need more than one. Also, the hands and background are grey on grey, so it's essentially the biggest watch in town, yet you still can't tell time on it. Nevertheless... my favorite watch for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's big!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews that it was bigger than you would expect, so I was expecting it to be very big... it was bigger in person. Took a little bit to get used to, I like it pretty well now. The small dials are hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: KelBel

customer_reviews.title: A REAL MANS WATCH
customer_reviews.text: This watch is amazing. Every time I wear it, I I get compliments. The Big Face and multiple dials give this watch that manly look it was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... in this style and honestly it looks a bit better online than in person
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave it a 4 outta 5 is because it fits a little tighter than the other watches in this style and honestly it looks a bit better online than in person, the red isn't as Bold. But none the less it's a great looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Edfing sexy watch!
customer_reviews.text: If i could give it a10 i would! My husband LOVES IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Razr_lips69

customer_reviews.title: I like big watches and I cannot lie
customer_reviews.text: If you like big watches, this is one to get. I have always been a fan of larger watches and, though I prefer digital, this is a really good looking watch. It definitely makes you stand out and tells the time too. The main dial can be a little hard to see in all lighting conditions, but this watch is more about a particular kind of style than functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Gravage

customer_reviews.title: No one should buy this watch. I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: No one should buy this watch. I bought it two months ago and all the pieces broke and it said it was water proof , but water got in it and it got humid. It should be in the flee market and not cost $250.
customer_reviews.author: Nely

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting it to have more weight like some if my other large face watches
customer_reviews.text: As expected this is a large watch but it is not overly heavy. I was expecting it to have more weight like some if my other large face watches. There are 4 time zones in this watch and they are easy to set. The minute "wheel" on the smaller time zones is a little hard to read because the numbers are printed so small. But that could just be my eyes. Overall this is pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: The X

customer_reviews.title: Diesel Men's 'Mr. Daddy 2.0' Quartz Stainless
customer_reviews.text: Big, Beautiful watch with boldness all over it, instantly one of my all-time favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Saurez

customer_reviews.title: Big, Bold and Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very large watch and commands attention! No getting around it. Striking good looks and heft. I love this watch. OK just added a photo and my wrists are a bit small but I don't care. Awesome watch.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Not water resistant - Glass fogged up after wearing when washing hands.
customer_reviews.author: Reachout

customer_reviews.title: Did not quite meet the expectation
customer_reviews.text: The face is really attractive and is the reason why I bought the watch. This is the third diesel watch I bought and the bracelet on this one is a bit deceiving as it does not look very authentic. It almost looks too cheap. I still like it but would have rather loved it for the kind of money spent, oh well
customer_reviews.author: Etienne

customer_reviews.title: Flashy and functional.
customer_reviews.text: This watch gets compliments all the time. It works very well and is easy to read. The band is not very adjustable compared to other watches in the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome but not for big wrists.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is awesome BUT it didn't fit my wrist. It doesn't come with extra links to extend and no one can add different links to it. To order another band would be an additional $80 so i had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Big Lou

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase, this is one of the nicest watches I've ever had, my first diesel I'm for sure going to have more in the future, the size is quite impressing, the colors are not as in the picture but it's better that way because it's not that bright so it looks a bit more elegant, it probably be very nice for people with thick wrists but I am a skinny man and it fits perfectly. PS: I it gets lost or stolen I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jephtafari

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: a gift for my brother inlaw.....he loves watches and I must say this one lived up to it's name. Large, bold color, extremely nice....would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tequi Jackson

customer_reviews.title: IT is so good looking in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: WOW! this thing is a beast. IT is so good looking in my opinion. The orange coating is very bright and a possible concern with scratches. It tells 4 different times and does not require instructions (for the other reviewers that complained). I absolutely love its gigantic oversize and style.
customer_reviews.author: chando

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof as it says , false information , do not buy this watch
customer_reviews.text: I have to remove the 5 stars i gave to this watch , very disapointed , today i forgot to removed from my wrist and at tbe beach , went to the water and discover that is not water prof , my watch stop working and has humidity all inside Very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Jorge M.

customer_reviews.title: A must for big fellows!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I’m a big, broad shouldered, guy. One of the only watches I’ve had that looks decent on my big wrists. Will buy another model from them in the future. Relatively cheap in comparison to higher-end models and looks dashing.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Can change new items
customer_reviews.text: It is too Defect It seems not new No plastic closed The parcel has a lek I want to request a new one, not a used item.
customer_reviews.author: Tagu

customer_reviews.title: great watch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch..At first, I felt it was too big. But then I realized the size was intentionally designed to make noise. Sure enough, the watch is only for the brave who want to sound loud when they arrive the scene
customer_reviews.author: Fru Christian Bills

customer_reviews.title: quality but not worth more than $150
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Watch I felt I over paid by half the Price the logo on the back is a Sticker now I gota go spend more $ & find some one that does engravings
customer_reviews.author: Nunu4Play

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I started using my purchase recently and the clock stays stuck in the hour does not advance and the time lags behind I regret having bought in this store the product
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: My husband gets a lot of compliments on this watch ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband gets a lot of compliments on this watch. It is huge! However, he is 6'4" so it doesn't look weird on him. I don't think I would suggest this watch for someone smaller, unless you want that kind of statement piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice indeed
customer_reviews.text: I had bought it as an gift and i must say it was 100% authentic..it even came with an after care treatment of how to take care of the watch. It is very nice. I thinking about buying me one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: My wife got it for me and it's a great Watch. Big but not too big and so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Craven

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch. Fits perfect. It is on the big side by fits my husband fantastic. Many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kicin

customer_reviews.title: the watch looks nice but I was wrong I thought that because of ...
customer_reviews.text: the watch looks nice but I was wrong I thought that because of the lost it was resistant to water that I could bathe with it and nothing, what desepcion
customer_reviews.author: esteban

customer_reviews.title: Looked awesome but just not me style being that
customer_reviews.text: You know its HUGE!! Im a big guy and it was big. Not the watches fault but I returned. Looked awesome but just not me style being that big
customer_reviews.author: Lee Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Hi Tech beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: My son in-law collects watches and he was overwhelmed with this watch when I gifted it to him for Christmas!. The watch was bigger than I thought but he loved it. I may get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ONLY THE BRAVE
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my Husband and he absolutely loved it. The pictures don't do it justice. Once he put it on he was already getting compliments on it. Men that have big hands and wrists this is the watch for you. The lens changes color depending on how the light hits it. Overall, great quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: VICTORIA LINARES

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied With Product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the watch, but I bought it for a Christmas gift and bought it way early. When he opened it, the band was broke, and the seller would not do anything about it. Very disappointed that they don't stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Brumitt

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Yes I order my Diesel in may of 2017 I'm very unhappy everything inside watches is falling apart for the price that shouldn't be happening.. not fair on my end I know it come with a two-year warranty.. what do I need to do to get a repair or replace... I was hopping to hear back from somebody...cell 678 206 8479
customer_reviews.author: Hosea connally

customer_reviews.title: April 26, 2016 to buy. Normal wear, yesterday found that the glass cracks. What should i do?
customer_reviews.text: April 26, 2016 to buy. Normal wear, yesterday found that the glass cracks. What should i do?
customer_reviews.author: Yo yo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, love it, delivered late next day , but customer service helped
customer_reviews.author: Felix Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but the watch dial was way bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but the watch dial was way bigger than expected or I have smaller wrist in comparison to others. Either way, had to return this because of that.
customer_reviews.author: ReticentSmile

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: OMG they are too huge! You should have large hand 100%
customer_reviews.author: Askhat Beygenov

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch I'm 6'3", and most watches on my appear to be ladies watches with the size of my hands and wrists. This watch has changed that, even with its size it is comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stevenot

customer_reviews.title: Broken box
customer_reviews.text: I received it with bad boxing , dust inside the box and on the top of watch plus the box is broken
customer_reviews.author: Ayman hazzouri

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected but comfortable to wear. The silicon covering keeps arm hairs from getting pinched. My most complimented watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great watch !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch!!! I absolutely love it. It has many features that I love. The watch had the date and three different times. Very useful. Watch is big enough to see and a little heavier which makes it nice and sturdy for a man.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Vic

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice quality and elegant in style. Nice weight. Bold look.
customer_reviews.author: jaybee

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: I love big face watches. Very different and perfect for my style.
customer_reviews.author: Philomena

customer_reviews.title: Continue to receive good comments every time I wear it
customer_reviews.text: Very big watch, but that's why I bought it! Continue to receive good comments every time I wear it. Probably not the most conventional and a little hard for me to read the time, but it's a very nice timepiece, so Five Stars hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: This is my third diesel watch, Love the look and style.
customer_reviews.author: Randy m

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch! These are a little expensive but my husband loves them. They are wonderfully made.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! He wears it every chance he gets, he loves to show it off! Beautiful watch for an excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your refund was greatly appreciated. I am looking for another with smaller face but same features.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the face design. But the face was too big for my taste.

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave me this watch as a father's day present. I'm loving it!

customer_reviews.title: Watch Face is Very Large!
customer_reviews.text: Returned, as the watch face is HUGE! Larger than "oversized". Not what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: debjam01

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice watch looks like like crap
customer_reviews.text: Humidity got inside and now there are water droplets that remain in the watch, it was never submersed in water or even splashed with water. For spending 200$ you should not expect this to happen , Such a nice watch looks like like crap now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chrono function did not work: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Impressive looking, but Chrono function did not work. Returned watch.
customer_reviews.author: RFC

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall look and feel, the gold time and size but dislike that it's not water proof. I use this watch for going out to nice venues or vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Jake H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the stainless steel, but was sent the black. I kept it anyway. Will order the stainless sometime later, if. I get another black I will return it. didn’t realize 2.0 was that large. all is well though.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but flaws.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a very beautiful watch, however within 2 weeks of arrival and wearing from hot to cold inside face steamed up, meaning some kind of moisture affected the watch, and a screw came loose from the band.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Diesels have the best watches.
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and noticeable watch. It grabs attention everywhere I go. It is the sole reason I haven't bought an Apple Watch yet. Diesels have the best watches.
customer_reviews.author: Chemtech7

customer_reviews.title: Big big big face.
customer_reviews.text: Wow the face is big. If you like that, go for it. Seems like good quality, looks nice. But huuuge!
customer_reviews.author: NATHAN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a birthday gift and he absolutely loves it. The red is a beautiful bright red and it's definitely a showstopper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good service. a bit dusty but because it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly described by the seller. No defects. The item is new, never worn or used. Good service. a bit dusty but because it has been in stock, I guess. Very cool and nice watch. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: EDZ

customer_reviews.title: At first my thought was whoa this is huge but it really is a good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch, very stylist. At first my thought was whoa this is huge but it really is a good looking watch.

customer_reviews.title: A lot bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Still good though. Kind of wish the actual time-telling face was a prior larger
customer_reviews.author: DJF

customer_reviews.text: Impeccable craftsmanship. Everything about this watch states style and elegance. Very beautiful timepiece. My husband receives compliments everywhere he goes!
customer_reviews.author: Gale Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Enormous
customer_reviews.text: It was huge. The time could be read from the space shuttle.

customer_reviews.title: Wonder if you have a smaller version of this watch?
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome but it looks way bigger than it looks in the pictures. I'm actually not wearing it because it hurts my wrist. I need to put some fat on before I start rocking it again.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loved this watch. He said it was the “best Christmas present he’s ever gotten.” It’s very big and flashy.

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome and is huge! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking watch that catches eyes. I have gotten a lot of compliments on it. It is gigantic and I love it

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. Better than the picture. Only downside is that the band just fits into the second slot. I have big wrists hence I like the big watch, but the band could be longer. Other than that, buy it!!

customer_reviews.title: beautiful. Does not come with the cap for waterproof
customer_reviews.text: beautiful. Does not come with the cap for waterproof. Had to service it 3 times already, problem still not fixed :(

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: Neck turning watch. Elegant and sporty. Always get complements. Looks much more expensive than what it cost.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, my husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, my husband loves it. We also were able to purchase additional links through Diesel online for $4.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this watch. It’s big and classy looking. So far it has held up well and working great.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy. They are excellent. It really makes my man, look like he takes care of business.

customer_reviews.title: A must have time watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch it's my be favourite. And Amazon got it to me on time and in great shape.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design DZ7312
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than my other SBA watches of same size. I like the way there so many tiny components making it look complicated. This is a very good watch.

customer_reviews.title: The watch face is nowhere close to the color in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The blue face in the picture is very misleading. It's actually alot closer to black then blue

customer_reviews.title: Ruined birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Im very disappointed, i bought this as a gift for my husband for his birthday. He put it on yesterday, and no rain, didn't get in any water and he has condensation under the lense.
customer_reviews.author: Melanee Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Have many other versions. Really like it...just not a fan of the fading colored watch band. Hard to tell that from pictuee

customer_reviews.title: Big and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Thought my husband was going to cry. This 60mm watch is GORGEOUS!!! And looks even better on the man I bought it for ;) we love large watches so this was spot on the money!

product_meta.title: Diesel Men's Mr. Daddy 2.0 Stainless Steel Chronograph Quartz Watch
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * The audacious cool of this Diesel® timepiece will keep you updated anywhere you go!
 * Large stainless steel case and pebbled leather bracelet.
 * Adjustable buckle closure.
 * Time 1: Three-hand analog display with quartz movement, three sub-dials and date display window.
 * Time 2: Digital display.
 * Time 3: Three-hand analog display with quartz movement and hour markers with minute track.
 * Time 4: Two-hand analog display with quartz movement and hour markers.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Textured blue dial.
 * Water resistant 30 meters/100 feet.
 * Imported.
 * Measurements:  *  Case Height: 57 mm
    *  Case Width: 57 mm
    *  Case Depth: 14 mm
    *  Band Width: 25 2⁄5 mm
    *  Band Circumference/Length: 9 in
    *  Weight: 5.2 oz
   
   






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :3.78 x 4.17 x 4.02 inches; 8.78 Ounces
 * Item model number :DZ7333
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :4 LR44 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :January 28, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Diesel Watches
 * ASIN :B00NTN8TU8

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #38,024 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #141 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #4 inMen's Contemporary & Designer Watches

feature_bullets: Case size: 57mm; Band size: 28mm; quartz movement with 3-hand analog display, date window, and 3 chronograph subdials; mineral crystal face; imported
Gold-tone plated stainless steel case with screw accents on bezel; black textured dial with gold-tone accents and multiple time zone displays
Gold-tone plated stainless steel bracelet with deployment-clasp closure
Water resistant to 100 feet (30 M): withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or showering
This product is authentic and sold directly from the brand manufacturer to Amazon
